objects.text:
• Digital Monitoring System
• Multiple Circuit Breakers
• Real-Time Power Display
• SCADA/BMS Compatible

product_details.name: Industrial-Grade Power Distribution Panel | Smart MCC Panel with Digital Display
product_details.description:
• Premium Motor Control Center (MCC) Panel with advanced digital monitoring system
• Multiple compartments with dedicated circuit breakers for enhanced safety
• Built-in digital metering display for real-time power monitoring
• Color-coded indicator lights for quick status monitoring
• Heavy-duty construction with powder-coated finish for durability
• Modular design allowing easy maintenance and future expansions
• IP54 rated enclosure for protection against dust and water splashes
• Integrated danger warnings and safety compliance labels
• Multiple ventilation slots for optimal temperature control
• Rotary handle operators for secure circuit isolation
• Industrial-grade components ensuring reliable performance
• Compatible with modern SCADA/BMS integration systems
• Suitable for industrial, commercial, and infrastructure applications
• Pre-wired and factory-tested for immediate installation

banner_details:
The banner is a modern, industrial-themed promotional layout for a smart MCC panel product. The design uses a two-by-two background grid split with vibrant blue dividing lines and subtle gridlines, overlaid with geometric accents and circular motifs. The top-left contains a bold, futuristic heading ("heading") followed by a bright yellow subheading ("subheading"), and a softer supporting text ("tagline"). The right side highlights the product image ("product_image"). The lower-left includes a feature list ("description") in bullet format, while the bottom-right features a dynamic yellow tagline ("tagline_2"), a bold white price point ("price"), and a bright yellow CTA button ("cta_background", "cta") with high contrast.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue (#1A2845)
- Deep Navy (#0D1D3A)
- Electric Blue (#4B6FE8)
- Bright Yellow (#FFD700)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Steel Blue (#A3B1D9)
product_color: The product image showcases a heavy-duty electrical panel with a predominantly industrial aesthetic. The base color is a muted *light gray* (#D3D0C9), offering a neutral and professional backdrop. *Black* (#000000) is used for labels and borders, providing contrast and readability. The image also integrates functional pops of color for signaling: *red* (#D72638) for danger and emergency, *green* (#3AA655), *yellow* (#FFD700), and *orange* (#FFA500) for status indicators, and *blue* (#0072CE) for information labels. These vibrant colors contrast sharply against the gray, drawing attention to critical controls without overwhelming the design. This thoughtful blending supports utility and safety.
